review_text: I don’t take one every night. Just when i feel like im going to have trouble sleeping or ive had caffeine too late in the day, i’ll take one before i brush my teeth. By the time im ready for bed i already feel more sleepy and then i end up having a deep sleep while also waking up naturally on time (without grogginess too!)

So gutted this is not in stock at the moment, my hsuabnd and I have every night and we fall asleep within 30 minutes and have the best sleep.  Tastes great and we feel well rested in the morning.  Highly recommend.
I have been having problems with my sleep while using this product. I get a good night's sleep and wake up with amazing energy.
Effective and is great product . Good for quality . Size is compact . Taste wise is palatable
Great quality and ingredients.  Small dosage is perfect.  Taste great
